Name: State Records New South Wales, Armidale Repository

About.Acquisition focus: The New England area's important association with mining activity is reflected in the State archives held at Armidale which include a number of mining registers.

About.Guides: Concise Guide to the State Archives, 2nd ed. (http://www.records.nsw.gov.au/cguide.htm)
